CustomField.description: Flag indicating that this business is a likely early adopter of new technology. 1 indicates this business has a high probability of being an early adopter of new technologies. 0 indicates that this business is likely to use current technologies longer and adopt new technologies later. This flag is based on a GeoResults proprietary model.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1 = high probability of being an early adopter of new technologies. 0 = likely to use current technologies longer and adopt new technologies later.
CustomField.label: High Tech Flag
